title: U.S. consumers who use marijuana 2019 , by age group
summary: In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 18-29_years to 30-49_years.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 18-29_years and 30-49_years.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 22.0 was reported at Year 18-29_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 11.0 was reached at Year 30-49_years
